body:
(This issue is a summary of a slack exchange started with eugeneswalker on March 9, 2020.)

Running `spack install` in the e4s environment terminates after building `slate` fails despite every other package having been successfully installed and put into binary cache.  The build of `slate` is broken and a separate issue has been filed with the developer.

See https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/15415#issuecomment-597185478 for more information.
title: bug: Environment/spack.yaml installs not "best effort"
